entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 01:00 AM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: NW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 9 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
